desc: Developed solutions for partnership modules, including commission calculation and tracking.
Implemented various payment products, including QR codes, Smart Collect, subscriptions, and payment links, to generate commissions.
Executed successful migrations of critical operations without interruption of service, such as user roles migration.
Managed P2 incident from start to finish, including triage and incident report generation.
Created a video tagging pipeline (pre-download service) to dynamically add metadata to MP4 files.
Integrated Vimeo-Create with partners such as ConstantContacts and Facebook.
Identified and resolved routing issues in internal framework.
Modified code generation scripts for routing files.
Fixed several issues in Vimeo-Create integration SDK, including overlays and post-message communication.
Developed authentication, app capabilities, and session handling for cookies, including support for JWT interoperability in cases where 3rd party cookies are blocked.
Good experience in managing crucial services such as user management, notification, workflows, authentication, and RBAC (role-based access control) services.
Created a TCP layer proxy for AWS Lambda and PostgreSQL communication without a persistent connection.
Developed connectors for data fetching through FTP/SFTP.
Integrated Sisnese (BI tool) into the frontend application.
Utilized various AWS services, including Lambda, DynamoDB, API Gateway, S3, Cloudfront, EC2, IAM, and SQS for application module development.
Improved frontend delivery through code-splitting and implementing a more effective caching strategy (edge caching and object expiration).
Developed a custom component library to move presentational components out of the business application.
Built an automated data fetching pipeline from mintuk.bvdinfo.com and Google Big Query.
